document_data.name: ''Web Grenade''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Web grenades''''' were a an [[alchemical]] thrown weapon that exploded in sticky ''[[web]]s'', entangling an enemy.
document_data.Description: ''Web grenades'' appeared to be round tight tangled orbs of webs pulsing with magic, ready to discharge all of its sticky contents with a simple throw.
document_data.Creation: These weapons could be created through alchemy by combining a suspension of [[spider silk]] extracted from [[giant spider]]s' or [[ettercap]]s' silk glands with certain types of alchemical vitriol.
